mapper.sql: id, device_id, `name`, manufacturer, model, custom_name, firmware, transport, ip, port, host_address, `password`, sdp_ip, local_ip, charset, tree_type, geo_coord_sys, `online`, register_time, keepalive_time, keepalive_interval_time,stream_mode, expires, mobile_position_submission_interval, subscribe_cycle_for_catalog, subscribe_cycle_for_mobile_position, subscribe_cycle_for_alarm, has_administrator,as_message_channel,switch_primary_sub_stream,ssrc_check, create_user_id, create_time, update_user_id, update_time
mapper.select: select vd.* from video_device vd,video_device_channel vdc ,video_platform_gb_channel vpgc where vd.device_id = vdc.device_id and vdc.channel_id = vpgc.device_channel_id and vdc.channel_id = #{channelId} and vpgc.platform_id = #{platformId}

select vd.*, vdc.channel_id as deviceId, vdc.name as name from video_device vd,video_device_channel vdc ,video_platform_gb_channel vpgc where vd.device_id = vdc.device_id and vdc.channel_id = vpgc.device_channel_id and vdc.channel_id = #{channelId} and vpgc.platform_id = #{platformId}

select vd.*, (select count(vdc.id) from video_device_channel vdc where video_device.device_id = vdc.device_id) as channelCount from video_device vd
and (vd.name like concat('%',#{param.query},'%') or vd.ip like concat('%',#{param.query},'%') or vd.sdp_ip like concat('%',#{param.query},'%'))
and(vd.has_administrator = 0 or (vd.has_administrator = 1 and vd.has_administrator = #{administrator}))
